title: #085 - My Guide to Fearless Selling
itunes:title: #085 - My Guide to Fearless Selling
description:
Stop approaching sales as if it’s this big, scary monster to be feared. The thing is, if you’re afraid of selling, you’re not going to make any sales. So let’s normalize the conversation around sales. I want to encourage you to see sales as something that is fun and as the tool to help you create more freedom in your life. In this episode, I share my tips to fearless selling.

THINGS YOU'LL LEARN:

  • How to change your mindset about sales
  • An easy peasy sales formula
  • How to create action steps that result in sales
  • Handling failure and bouncing back
  • The right way to make a “cold call”
  • & so much more!
